page.title: 16Berwick St.James Playgroup
page.content: {Berwick St.James Pre-school {Playgroup}was re-started three years ago for twelve children under the age of five. We meet three mornings a week from nine-thirty to twelve. Children who are three years old and over come every day by themselves but the little ones bring Mum too as we are not insured for younger children. We are bound by many rules and regulations and have to be inspected by the Fire Brigade. The Social Services keep in touch and the Playgroup Association gives helpful advice. The purpose of a playgroup is to help a child to learn through play.Children learn to share and to mix with other children and adults.
